@graph.name: Using Google Natural Language Demo To Extract Entities & OptizenAI To Update Shopify Product Descriptions At Scale
@graph.description: The following is the process of using Google Natural Language Demo and OptizenAI to extract entities to use in Shopify product descriptions, and build enriched description content for individual, small, or large groups of products. A shout out needs to go to Steve Toth of SEOnotebook.com for his note on using the Google NLP Demo […]

step.name: Extract entities from Wikipedia
step.text: Use Google NLP Demo to extract entities from Wikipedia. Navigate to the Wikipedia page and copy the body content. Then go to https://cloud.google.com/natural-language and scroll to the Demo section. Paste the content into the field and click Analyze

step.name: Process entities in Google Sheets
step.text: Copy the block of output and head over to the provided Google Sheets template. Paste the output into cell [A2]. The sheet will show all entities as a list in cell [B2]. Remove duplicates and choose the entities you want to add in the prompt

step.name: Navigate to OptizenAI products
step.text: Navigate to the 'product' tab in Optizen AI. Search via name or using tags for the product or products you wish to update. Use the check boxes to select the products

step.name: Configure the prompt
step.text: Select the 'PAS Framework - Entities - Internal Links' from the drop down under the Product Description prompt field. Ensure you are using the prompt repository tab. Check the box for 'Update this section'. Replace the sections with square brackets for your specific use case

step.name: Execute and review
step.text: Click Proceed to run the prompt. On completion, check the output using the Log section of the app. You can then choose to keep or restore the update

mainEntity.name: Where can I use this AI prompt?

acceptedAnswer.text: This prompt is specific to the product description of Shopify products. You can use the prompt in its raw form from the repository, and then replace sections for your specific use case where [Square Brackets] are present

mainEntity.name: When should I use this prompt?

acceptedAnswer.text: This prompt can be used for any product in your Shopify store using the Optizen AI app if you want a more advanced AI prompt to update product descriptions leveraging NLP entities for content, and adding internal links
